name: GEORGIA CHAMBER OF COMMERCE
sampleDescriptions: HR 1 - Support reduction of corporate income tax, support inclusion of private activity bonds, support inclusion of advanced refunding, support extension of nuclear production tax credit.
Oppose proposed steel/aluminum tariffs. Support NAFTA modernization.

Oppose changes to consumer nicotine regulations
